document_data.name: Ildomyl
document_data.mainbody: '''Ildomyl''' was an apprentice [[Zhentarim]] [[wizard]] in [[High Dale]]. He was a friend of [[Nordryn Spellbinder]].
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]], Ildomyl was a member of the secret [[Zhent]] occupation army in High Dale. He was on duty as gate-guardian when he was killed by [[Elminster Aumar]] and [[Sharantyr]].
